movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: Ready player one
movies.description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

movies.title: Dune: Part One
movies.description: Paul Atreides arrives on Arrakis after his father accepts the stewardship of the dangerous planet. However, chaos ensues after a betrayal as forces clash to control melange, a precious resource.

movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: Arthur Fleck, a party clown, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of crime and chaos.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he decides to stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman has a new foe, the Joker, who is an accomplished criminal hell-bent on decimating Gotham City. Together with Gordon and Harvey Dent, Batman struggles to thwart the Joker before it is too late.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: In the realm of underworld, a series of incidents intertwines the lives of two Los Angeles mobsters, a gangster's wife, a boxer and two small-time criminals.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: Unhappy with his capitalistic lifestyle, a white-collared insomniac forms an underground fight club with Tyler, a careless soap salesman. Soon, their venture spirals down into something sinister.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, disintegrates half of the universe, the Avengers must reunite and assemble again to reinvigorate their trounced allies and restore balance.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers must stop Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, from getting his hands on all the infinity stones. However, Thanos is prepared to go to any lengths to carry out his insane plan.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: During World War II, Lt. Gen. Leslie Groves Jr. appoints physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer to work on the top-secret Manhattan Project. Oppenheimer and a team of scientists spend years developing and designing the atomic bomb. Their work comes to fruition on July 16, 1945, as they witness the world's first nuclear explosion, forever changing the course of history.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: When a few objects that can be manipulated and used as weapons in the future fall into the wrong hands, a CIA operative, known as the Protagonist, must save the world.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

series.title: Dark
series.description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

series.title: The Boys
series.description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

series.title: The Walking Dead
series.description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

series.title: Community
series.description: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eccentric staff and student body.

series.title: Vikings
series.description: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

series.title: Yellowstone
series.description: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

series.title: StartUp
series.description: A desperate banker, a Haitian-American gang lord and a Cuban-American hacker are forced to work together to unwittingly create their version of the American dream - organized crime 2.0.

series.title: Mr. Robot
series.description: Elliot, a cyber-security engineer suffering from anxiety, works for a corporation and hacks felons by night. Panic strikes him after Mr Robot, a cryptic anarchist, recruits him to ruin his company.

series.title: The Last Kingdom
series.description: Uhtred, the son of a nobleman, is captured and raised by Danes. Once he grows up, he has to choose whom he will protect, the land where he grew up or the people who raised him as their own.

series.title: The Man in the High Castle
series.director: Michael Cedar; Jean Higgins; Jordan Sheehan; David W. Zucker
series.description: This series, loosely based Philip K. Dick's novel of the same name, takes a look at what the world might look like had the outcome of World War II turned out differently. In this dystopian scenario, the Axis powers won the war, leading to the United States being divided into three parts, an area controlled by the Japanese, a Nazi-controlled section, and a buffer zone between the two. Despite the oppression, a new hope emerges when films turn up that seem to show a different world. A woman believes the films contain the key to freedom and is determined to find their mysterious guardian.

series.title: American Gods
series.director: Brian Reitzell; Danny Bensi; Saunder Jurriaans; Andrew Lockington
series.description: Shadow, an ex-convict, takes up the job of guarding Mr Wednesday, who is the God Odin in disguise. Eventually, Shadow has to adjust and deal with his new reality and figure out his own place in it.

series.title: Peaky Blinders
series.director: Caryn Mandabach Productions; Tiger Aspect Productions; Screen Yorkshire
series.description: Tommy Shelby, a dangerous man, leads the Peaky Blinders, a gang based in Birmingham. Soon, Chester Campbell, an inspector, decides to nab him and put an end to the criminal activities.

series.title: True Detective
series.director: Cary Joji Fukunaga (s. 1); Various (s. 2–3); Issa López (s. 4)
series.description: Police officers and detectives around the USA are forced to face dark secrets about themselves and the people around them while investigating homicides.

series.title: Ozark
series.description: Created by Bill Dubuque ("The Accountant," "The Judge"), this drama series stars Jason Bateman as Marty Byrde, a financial planner who relocates his family from Chicago to a summer resort community in the Ozarks. With wife Wendy and their two kids in tow, Marty is on the move after a money-laundering scheme goes wrong, forcing him to pay off a substantial debt to a Mexican drug lord in order to keep his family safe. While the Byrdes' fate hangs in the balance, the dire circumstances force the fractured family to reconnect.

series.title: Marco Polo
series.description: Venetian merchant and adventurer Marco Polo journeys across Europe and Asia and lands up as a prisoner in the palace of Kublai Khan, a 13th century Mongolian emperor.
